DataElement.preferredName: Climbing Stairs Physical Activity Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score to represent activities in a typical day related to climbing stairs.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to climbing stairs physical activity assessment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm)

Concepts.definition: Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.

Property.preferredDefinition: Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function
